metadata.name: Platz
metadata.description: In artists plenary compositions he displayed colours of the German national flag in a casual, but very open manner. At varying degrees of preciseness in the visualization of their unity and opposition, Ilgvars Zalans created dynamic compositions in which the main thing was the instrumental style of the colour, created by a strong expression and specified by the subtle and elegant nuances of technical devices, complex texture and a multitude of layers
